casebody.data:
Peter A. McCABE, as Trustee in Bankruptcy of BYRD COAL COMPANY, Inc., Bankrupt, Appellant, v. Robert GLADSTONE, Jr., Appellee, William F. May et al., Defendants. No. 177. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 4, 1937. Herman G. Robbins, of Brooklyn, N. Y. (William Shapiro, of Brooklyn, N. Y., on the brief), for appellant. David Haar, of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
